choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for seven days.  My restrictions are dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, and cashews
Here's a balanced, nutritious meal plan tailored to your dietary restrictions. Enjoy!

**Day 1:**

* Breakfast: Overnight oats with almond milk, topped with fresh berries and a little honey substitute (such as maple syrup)
* Lunch: Quinoa salad with grilled vegetables, chickpeas, and a lemon herb vinaigrette
* Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted vegetable medley (carrots, bell peppers, zucchini) seasoned with herbs and olive oil

**Day 2:**

* Breakfast: Protein-packed chia pudding made with almond milk, topped with fresh fruit and a little honey substitute
* Lunch: Whole grain wrap filled with roasted vegetables, hummus, and greens
* Dinner: Stuffed bell peppers with quinoa, black beans, corn, and avocado. Season with herbs and olive oil

**Day 3:**

* Breakfast: Nutrient-rich green smoothie made with almond milk, spinach, banana, and a little honey substitute
* Lunch: Chickpea and mixed greens salad with lemon vinaigrette and toasted almonds (use cashew or sunflower seeds as an alternative)
* Dinner: Grilled portobello mushrooms with a side of roasted vegetables and quinoa. Season with herbs, olive oil, and balsamic vinegar

**Day 4:**

* Breakfast: Nut-free granola made with gluten-free oats, coconut, and dried fruit (choose unsweetened options) served with almond milk
* Lunch: Lentil soup with a side of mixed greens and balsamic vinaigrette. Add some avocado for healthy fats
* Dinner: Baked tofu with a side of steamed vegetables (such as broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers) seasoned with herbs and olive oil

**Day 5:**

* Breakfast: Fruit-packed chia pudding made with coconut milk, topped with fresh fruit and a little honey substitute
* Lunch: Whole grain wrap filled with roasted vegetables, tempeh (or textured plant protein), and greens. Dress with lemon herb vinaigrette
* Dinner: Stuffed bell peppers with quinoa, black beans, corn, and avocado. Season with herbs and olive oil

**Day 6:**

* Breakfast: Nutrient-rich green smoothie made with coconut milk, spinach, banana, and a little honey substitute
* Lunch: Chickpea and mixed greens salad with lemon vinaigrette and toasted cashew (or sunflower seeds)
* Dinner: Grilled shrimp skewers with a side of roasted vegetables and quinoa. Season with herbs, olive oil, and lime zest

**Day 7:**

* Breakfast: Nut-free granola made with gluten-free oats, coconut, and dried fruit (choose unsweetened options) served with almond milk
* Lunch: Lentil soup with a side of mixed greens and balsamic vinaigrette. Add some avocado for healthy fats
* Dinner: Baked tofu with a side of steamed vegetables (such as broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers) seasoned with herbs and olive oil
